text:
League 1
ASSE - Monaco: "It's the reward of a close-knit team"
Scorer tonight, Denis Bouanga was the big man of the victory of the Greens against AS Monaco. Discover his reaction at the end of the meeting.
03 Nov 2019, 22:40 by Antoine Chirat



The Greens are back! After a catastrophic start to the season, the St Etienne are better thanks to the arrival of Claude Puel who metamorphosed the faces of his men. Tonight, they won on the smallest margin against Monaco on a realization of Denis Bouanga, for his third achievement of the season.




"The new coach has imposed his tactics"




Bouanga decisive against Monaco + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

At the end of the meeting, the Gabonese returned to his performance and that of his team: "We wanted it, it's the reward of a tight-knit team, we have a good defensive balance. We had to block Silva who hurt us in the first half, we did well with Ryad (Boudebouz), we felt better, we went more forward. then we had the chances for the second goal, but we did not put it in. We're a solid team and we're going to continue like that, the new coach has imposed his tactics, he has redistributed the cards. Everybody gives the best of himself, which means that we win a lot of matches. "
¬†Denis Bouanga: all information about the player
